Articles.Content:
Ok I'll show off my ships here, some of you have seen it but please bear with me. I like to showoff a lot.7

I have other crafts on my page complete including Naval Ships, Tanks, Planes, and Buildings and Other Special crafts, KRAKEN Technologies (Or click the Kraken on my signature). Please take a visit and tell me what you think (WARNING: IMAGE HEAVY)

I'll post my battlecraft starships here though.

NEW STARSHIP: BATTLECRAFT

CRUISER "NAUTILUS-BATTLE BARGE"

Class: "Cruiser"

Name: "Nautilus-Battle Barge"

Model: 3

Cost: 260038.0

Part Count: 976 parts in 2 stages

Total Mass: 125.6 tons (fully armed), 91.7 tons (unarmed)

Armament: Equipped with 8 New generation space missiles (Newly developed Warheads named Tirepedoes). Missiles can be used as long range cruise missile (for ship interception) or direct fire (for close-encounters)

Armor and Constuction: Basic rigid structure with overall double layered armor. 3 layers of armor on the center with simple strut reinforcements. (Can take up to 3 critical hits before going down)

Powerplant and Propulsion: 12 thermoelectric generators. 4 Nuclear Engines with basic fuel. (Fuel of 3400+ fully, armed and around 3100+ fuel, unarmed)

Notes: press 3 to toggle engines. press 1 to toggle the space missiles and press 2 to active sepatrons.

History: Originally designed by the Kraken Faction as a heavy duty industrial supply barge for the space fleet. Complete with fuel ballast tanks and compartmentalized hull, engineers have found out that the ship hull was far stronger for the ship it's size and function. They realized that it could be used as an effective reactive armor and have converted this ship to be retrofitted for war efforts. Although designated as the "Nautilus" Model, it is popular to the space cadets to be named as the "Battle Barge" because of it's short stout look.

Craft File: http://www./download/m87dr53dedci7yk/BATTLE+BARGE.craft

Javascript is disabled. View full album

NEW STARSHIP: BATTLECRAFT

CRUISER "ATLANTIS"

Class: Cruiser

Name: "Atlantis"

Model: 2

Cost: 200356.0

Part Count: 673 parts in 16 stages (689 during launch)

Total Mass: 143.74 tons

Armament: Equipped with 8 New generation space missiles (Newly developed Warheads). Missiles can be used as long range cruise missile (for ship interception) or direct fire (for close-encounters)

Armor and Constuction: Basic rigid structure with overall quadruple layered armor. 5-6 layers of armor on the side engines with simple strut reinforcements.

Powerplant and Propulsion: 4 thermoelectric generators. 4 Nuclear Engines, with basic fuel. (Fuel of 4700+ fully armed and around 3500+ fuel unarmed)

Note: Press 3 to toggle engines. During launch use Hyperedit

to send it instantly into orbit before it falls over.

Press the first stage to decouple the stand it should activate the engine at the same time.

HEAVY CRUISER/BATTLECRUISER

Class: "Heavy Cruiser/Battlecruiser"

Name: "Hespera"

Model: 7

Cost: 297179.5

Part Count: 1022 parts in 5 stages

Total Mass: 188.1 tons

Armament: 12 Total: 4 SRB's (Solid Rocket Boosters) "Burst" torpedoes, 6 "Hitter" Standard Liquid Fuel Engine Torpedoes and 2 "Shock" Experimental Torpedoes with experimental warhead payload (Equipped with 2 Small Supercharged I-Beam tipped shells each, which deploys before impact and makes a double action torpedo in 2 stages)

Armor and Constuction: Extremely Durable Hull and Strut reinforced (It is no longer susceptible to buckling and bending at high gravity). Double layered reactive armor (up to three at the core module and at the Engines).

Powerplant and Propulsion: 8 hidden thermoelectric generators. 6 LV-T45 Liquid Fuel Engines, with basic fuel and monopropellant for RCS

Extra: Can Support up to 4 crew

Craft File: http://www./download/z8rn2ox5ss7pa6a/Heavy_Cruiser-Battlecruiser.craft

Name: "Fortuna"

Model: 9

Cost: 320955.2

Part Count: 1406 parts in 3 stages

Total Mass: 306.1 tons

Armament: Equipped with 4 "Frontal" shells (Standard Long I-beam variant) can be retrofitted with additional missiles and torpedoes if need be

Armor and Constuction: Double layered armor, up to three at the core module and at the front. Strut reinforced hull (It is no longer susceptible to buckling and bending at high gravity)

Powerplant and Propulsion: 4 1x6 Solar panels plus 6 hidden thermoelectric generator. 10 LV-T30 Liquid Fuel Engines, with basic fuel no RCS monopropellants

FEATURED VIDEOS

O Fortuna (Battleship)

A KSP Cinematic- HMS Chelsea runs into a heavily armored battleship, the KRKN FORTUNA. After loosing a few missiles, and taking some hits, she calls in some backup.

The Battle of Zokesia: Trailer

A Series of epic proportions is coming to Kerbal Space Program; The battle between the Zokesian Empire, longtime inhabitants of the Duna-Ike system, and the KRAKEN, a ruthless war machine hellbent on wiping every Kerbal off the face of the Solar System. It is Zokesia which must answer the call; take the blows; and save the Kerbal Race from the KRAKENs.

Battle of Zokesia, Episode I: Trial By Fire.

The first in a series documenting the epic struggle for survival, the war between Zokesia and the KRAKENs. In this episode, a Duna patrol is attacked by a battleship squadron. They suffer heavy losses but manage to drive the Invaders from low Duna Orbit, at least temporarily. But a storm is brewing over Ike, one that threatens all Kerbalkind in the region.

DREADNOUGHT

Class: Dreadnought

Name: "Trident"

Model: 1

Cost: 285808.2

Part Count: 1547 parts in 3 stages

Total Mass: 276.84 tons

Armament: Equipped with 1 "Mainsail" Rocket (Can be used for Orbital Bombardment Strikes) 6 short I-beams (Supercharged) and 6 long I-beams (Standard)

Armor and Constuction: Double to Triple layered armor, up to four at the core module. Strut reinforced hull (May be susceptible to buckling and bending at high gravity)

Powerplant and Propulsion: 3 Large Solar panels plus 6 thermoelectric generators. 1 "Skipper" and 3 "Poodle" Liquid Fuel Engines, with basic fuel no RCS monopropellants

Note: Always turn off the Monopropellant And Liquid Fuel on the Mainsail Rocket.

Craft File: http://www./download/z4xsf1jc8sepwto/Dreadnought.craft

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Serves as an orbital launch platform too for hitting planetary surface targets, like a mothership.

This is it.

I present to you my stock missile cruiser, it's got 10 missiles in it's drum magazine.

1: Stage. Then: toggle SAS when pointed in the right direction.

2: Switch to missile drum. Switch off SAS. Press alt-E 10 times.

3: Aimed yet? Then fire!

4: Wait until the next missile is loaded. Fire!

Action Group 1: toggle main engines.

Action Group 2: toggle: purge launch tube (make sure throttle is at 100%)

Download link: http://kerbalx.com/crafts/1070
I donno how you people do this stuff. +Rep.

Niiiice! We should have a little battle sometime, Ive some cruisers myself.

I just completed a new warship, and the first out of my new "MSS" line that is combat-ready (the first one being a scout drone, and the second having an uber-high part count).

Quoted from my company thread:

The MSS-3 Paladin is now complete and ready for download.

This warship carries a crew of two in internal pods, and features a dual LV-N propulsion system, reactive-armor hull, and a formidable armament.

Weapons:

-2x ASM EVO guided anti-warship missiles

-4x 4-shot i-beam missile stacks (dumb-fire)

Propulsion:

-2x LV-N thermonuclear rocket engine

-full RCS maneuvering thruster system

/Action Groups:/

1-Engines

2-ASM 1

3-ASM 2

4-1st 4-shot I-beam salvo

5-2nd 4-shot I-beam salvo

All other weapons must be fired via staging.

Piloting Tips:

-Control the ship via the large docking port in the missile bay OR through the hidden probe cores clipped into the ship's spine.

-To EVA the pliots, you must dock a crew capsule equipped craft with at least 1 empty seat to the ship, and then transfer the pilot you wish to evac out of the ship.

-When using the ASMs, make sure to fire from a good, mid-to-long-range distance. This allows the missile to accelerate more and deal more damage.

Craft DL:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/botf73en42of33y/MU%20MSS-3%20Paladin.craft?dl=0
